Topic.Title: I thought this text-based stuff was 'old school' but WOW!

Posts.EditableText: I'm really impressed!!  There's a ton to learn and have fun with.  I can use my creativity and basic html skills, and have a blast creating just about anything.  Thanks to you folks for all your work on this and keeping it alive!
Posts.HTML: I'm really impressed!! There's a ton to learn and have fun with. I can use my creativity and basic html skills, and have a blast creating just about anything. Thanks to you folks for all your work on this and keeping it alive!

Posts.EditableText: Yes, it's fun to learn how to do this. You can get a pretty nice product out pretty easily. And they even allow you to post up and host on their site.
Posts.HTML: Yes, it's fun to learn how to do this. You can get a pretty nice product out pretty easily. And they even allow you to post up and host on their site.

Posts.EditableText: Yeah, it took me so many downloads of different game makers to find this gem > Quest text adventure.
Posts.HTML: Yeah, it took me so many downloads of different game makers to find this gem > Quest text adventure.
